info.creator: Frank Bi
info.twitterTextPart2: %25 on this week's @NewsHour news quiz! Take the news quiz yourself!

ques.prompt: Gay citizens face life prison sentences and their friends are now legally required to report them to the police, due to a strict new law signed on Monday where?
ques.blurb: North Carolina and North Korea, what's the difference here?

ques.prompt: Jimmy Carter, the 39th President of the United States, is said to have seen what in 1969?
ques.blurb: This incident has its own wikipedia page. Check it out here.
